Paul Russo, MD, FACS - MSK Urologic Surgeon
Paul Russo, MD, FACS - MSK Urologic Surgeon

adrFormatAddress: 353 E 68th St, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text: I’ve been thrilled with the entire team at Memorial Sloan Kettering. I mentioned this in a previous review of Dr. Bochner, even the parking attendant are amazing. Everyone I’ve encountered has been incredibly helpful and thoughtful. Dr. Russo is at a level that I’ve never encountered. I have a lot of medical issues, as a result, I deal with a lot of medical professionals. Dr. Russo, simply stated, is like no medical professional, I’ve ever experienced. Incredibly insightful, incredibly patient with his explanation incredibly interested in the big picture of my health and quality of life. I feel more at peace with my myriad of medical conditions after having spent time with Dr. Russo. I look forward to the direction I’m heading in whatever that may be. That confidence is inspired, purely and completely by Dr. Russo’s information dissemination. Thank you Memorial Sloan Kettering. Thank you to the entire staff. Thank you Dr. Bochner. Thank you Dr. Russo.

originalText.text: I have no words to express my gratitude and respect to this brilliant doctor who is also possessed of great compassion and charisma. He and his team successfully performed a very complex surgery in March 2022 at Memorial Sloan Kettering hospital and managed to remove a large malignant mass on my husband's only kidney and save it.  Before We went to see Dr. Paul Russo, we were in another hospital where the entire kidney was going to be removed robotically and my husband was going to go into dialysis. We know that our Father God put him in our path.

originalText.text: The best!  He was able to diagnose and treat my liposarcoma and communicate everything I needed to know clearly. His team is prompt and courteous. I trust no other for my care.

text.text: The best!  He was able to diagnose and treat my liposarcoma and communicate everything I needed to know clearly. His team is prompt and courteous. I trust no other for my care.

originalText.text: Dr Russo operated on my husband twice in 1999 and 2000 for undetected cancer that had spread throughout his lymph system. He saved his life. We could not say how grateful we are to his expertise and amazing kindness to us.

text.text: Dr Russo operated on my husband twice in 1999 and 2000 for undetected cancer that had spread throughout his lymph system. He saved his life. We could not say how grateful we are to his expertise and amazing kindness to us.

originalText.text: Dr. Russo took care of me with great expertise as well as being very clear and human. He explained my situation in understandable detail and with compassion. He is extremely personable and pleasant. He gave me all the time I needed to absorb the situation and answered all pertinent questions. He is an asset  to MSK and the medical community as a whole.
